sensitivity_index_S1: Thermal throttling: High CPU → Heat generation → Increased resistance → Power reduction feedback loop
column14: At T>35°C & CPU>70%: System throttles CPU frequency by 15-25% to prevent overheating. Paradoxically EXTENDS TTE (+8.5%) but degrades UX. Model captures via temperature-dependent CPU efficiency η(T).

sensitivity_index_S1: Auto-brightness: Outdoor (1000 lux) requires 40% higher brightness than indoor (300 lux) for same perceived luminance
column14: Outdoor use: Ambient light 1000-10000 lux forces screen to 80-100% brightness (vs. indoor 30-50%). Model uses Weber-Fechner law: Perceived brightness ∝ log(stimulus). Impact: -6.2% TTE outdoors.

coefficient: S) = P_wifi × δ_wifi + P_cellular × (1 + k_signal × (1-S)^2) × δ_cellular
sensitivity_index_S1: Weak signal retry: 4G/5G power scales quadratically with signal loss. WiFi unaffected (short range)
column14: Weak 4G signal (<-100dBm): Retry overhead increases P_network from 300mW → 540mW (+80%). Model: P_network ∝ (1-S)^2 where S=[0,1] normalized signal. WiFi immune due to <50m range. Outdoor navigation most affected.

physical_mechanism: GPS data upload: Location data transmitted via cellular (WiFi unavailable outdoors). Combined drain: GPS 200mW + Upload 150mW
interpretation_guidance: GPS without network: 200mW. GPS + 4G sync: 350mW (+75%). Synergy: Navigation apps upload location every 5-10s. Model adds P_network_sync term when GPS active. Recommendation: Cache maps (offline mode) saves 43% combined power.

sensitivity_index_S1: Adaptive bitrate: Low bandwidth (BW<5Mbps) forces resolution downgrade. Lower resolution → Less CPU (hardware decoder) → Less network (smaller packets). Triple benefit.
column14: 4K video + WiFi 50Mbps: P_decoder=250mW, P_network=150mW. 1080p + 4G 10Mbps: P_decoder=180mW, P_network=400mW. Counter-intuitive: Lower resolution on slow network INCREASES total power (+40mW) due to network overhead dominating decoder savings.

sensitivity_index_S1: Doze mode: Android enters aggressive power saving when screen off >5min. Background apps throttled by 80%. But wakelock-holding apps bypass this.
column14: Screen on: 10 background apps = 10×15mW = 150mW. Screen off >5min: Doze mode reduces to 10×3mW = 30mW (-80%). But messengers with wakelock: Still 15mW each. Model uses binary δ_doze multiplier. Recommendation: Uninstall wakelock abusers (identified via BetterBatteryStats).

sensitivity_index_S1: SEI growth: Fast charging (>1C) at high temp (T>30°C) quadratically accelerates solid-electrolyte-interphase layer growth on anode. Permanent capacity loss.
column14: Fast charge at 40°C: Aging rate 3.2× faster than slow charge at 25°C. Model: Aging ∝ C_rate^1.5 × Arrhenius(T). Not immediate TTE impact but reduces Q_max over cycles. At 500 cycles: Q_fade = 25% (fast+hot) vs. 15% (slow+cool). Recommendation: Charge <80% + avoid charging in hot cars.

sensitivity_index_S1: Demographic usage: Young users (18-25): Gaming 3h/day. Middle-age (40-55): Navigation 1.5h/day. Affects average daily power profile.
interpretation_guidance: Demographic insight: Young heavy gamers: Avg daily 1.2W (TTE=7.5h from full). Middle-age light users: Avg 0.45W (TTE=20h). Model can personalize TTE prediction with usage history. Requires 7-day training period to learn individual patterns.
